text:
House [[Cannith]] has a long history with [[Cyre]], and
centuries ago, the house was granted one of the
seven [[Vermishards]] of [[Metrol]]. While officially named the
Vermishard of Steel, it was commonly known as the
Forge in the latter days of the [[Last War]]. Many of the Forgeâ€™s most important facilities lie below ground. The spire that rises above the city contains vaults of wonders
produced over the ages, along with barracks for the
many [[magewright]]s and artisans that worked in the
depths. The top of the Vermishard was the Palace of the
Gorgon, the personal domain of [[Starrin d'Cannith]], now deceased.
title: Vermishard of Steel
tags: Metrol ruin Vermishards Northshore enclave museum
